articles.author: Christiaan Hetzner
articles.title: Walmart just leveled with Americans: China won't be paying for Trump's tariffs, in all likelihood you will - Fortune
articles.description: Trump promised voters tariffs are a panacea for the economy, but Walmart finance chief John David Rainey warned they will be inflationary for customers.
articles.content: Voters who returned Donald Trump to the Oval Office in the hope that living costs would return to the halcyon days before the pandemic may be in for a shock. Arkansas-based Walmart, the worlds larges… [+3841 chars]
